title: Koroshiya Shokudou
description:
Description :
        A restaurant manager whose life is in danger x an assassin who loses his memory in a day and is appeased by the stomach of a food terrorism BL???Warning: Not recommended for reading late at night as it may increase hunger??A hitman named Akatsuki, whose memory disappears in a day due to the aftereffects of a past injury, spends his days just completing a set routine and requests. One day, while on business at a members-only restaurant, he is thrown off balance by his target, the shady manager Aoi, and fails at his job. Half-forced to eat the curry made by Aoi, Akatsuki realizes that he still remembers eating the curry the next morning. In order to find out why his memory has improved, Akatsuki ends up working part-time at Aoi's restaurant as a live-in employee, but...!?+
